Title: The Prestige
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Priest (novel)
Actors: Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Piper Perabo
Plot: The rivalry between two magicians becomes more exacerbated by their attempt to perform the ultimate illusion.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 20 nominations.
